playQuotes.name: Joseph Chilton Pearce
playQuotes.said: Play is the only way the highest intelligence of humankind can unfold

playQuotes.name: Martin Buber
playQuotes.said: Play is the exultation of the possible

playQuotes.name: George Dorsey
playQuotes.said: Play is the beginning of knowledge

playQuotes.name: Diane Ackerman
playQuotes.said: Play is our brain’s favorite way of learning

playQuotes.name: G. K. Chesterton
playQuotes.said: The true object of all human life is play

playQuotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche
playQuotes.said: In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play

playQuotes.name: Roger von Oech
playQuotes.said: Necessity may be the mother of invention, but play is certainly the father

badQuotes.name: Hitler
said: Strength lies not in defence but attack
Success is the sole earthly judge of right and wrong
He alone, who owns the youth, gains the future
If you want to shine like sun first you have to burn like it.
If you win, you need not have to explain...If you lose, you should not be there to explain!
Words build bridges into unexplored regions
To conquer a nation, first disarm its citizens
If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower

badQuotes.name: Stalin
said: I trust no one, not even myself
Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns why should we let them have ideas
Those who vote decide nothing. Those who count the vote decide everything
Everybody has a right to be stupid, but some people abuse the privilege
The only way a kid is going to practise is if it's total fun for him.. and it was for me
Die, but do not retreat
A man's eyes should be torn out if he can only see the past
I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.

badQuotes.name: The Joker
said: If you're good at something NEVER do it for free
We stopped checking for monsters under our bed, when we realized they were inside us.
I'm strong because i've been weak. I'm fearless because i've been afraid. I'm wise because i've been foolish
The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by  success

badQuotes.name: Ted Bundy
said: I don't feel guilty for anything. I feel sorry for people who feel guilt.
Try to touch the past. Try to deal with the past. It's not real. It's just a dream
We all go a little mad sometimes
Countless millions who have walked this earth before us have gone through this, so this is just an experience we all share.

badQuotes.name: Jeffrey Dahmer
said: I’ve got to start eating at home more
I made my fantasy life more powerful than my real one

badQuotes.name: O.J. Simpson
said: I could not tell you the date of my mother's death. I could not tell you the date of my dad's death. These are not dates that I find significant.
I always put my fantasies in the realm of goals
You've got to stand up. You can't let people run over you

badQuotes.name: Darth Vader
said: Be careful not to choke on your convictions
He will join us or die
All i am surrounded by  is fear, and dead men

regQuotes.name: Martin Shkreli
said: I bought the culture! It's mine!
Keep my # off this shit
I want to cure many deseases and save childrens lives
Being a public figure is instantly grounds for prosecution
Politics are well past logic. Its entertainment

regQuotes.name: Einstein
said: Imagination is more important than knowledge
Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.

regQuotes.name: Danny Devito
said: I'll tell you one thing, it's a cruel, cruel world
Oh oops, I dropped my monster condom that i use for my.. magnum dong

regQuotes.name: Donald Trump
said: I need loyalty, I expect loyalty
I have tremendous respect for women
The beauty of me is that I’m very rich.
I have never seen a thin person drinking Diet Coke.

regQuotes.name: Bill gates
said: Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world… if you do so, you are insulting yourself.
If you are born poor it’s not your mistake, but if you die poor it’s your mistake.
Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.

regQuotes.name: Steve Jobs
said: Stay hungry, stay foolish
Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower..
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life

regQuotes.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
said: My mother is a walking miracle
I've been a pretty lucky man
I think i will always feel like an outsider

regQuotes.name: Will Smith
said: I have a great time with my life, and I wanna share it.
Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, because hate in your heart will consume you too.

regQuotes.name: Jeff Bezos
said: It's not an experiment if you know it's going to work
If you can't tolerate critics, don't do anything new or interesting

regQuotes.name: Barack Obama
said: These days, I look in the mirror and I have to admit, I'm not the strapping young Muslim socialist that I used to be
If I had to name my greatest strength, I guess it would be my humility. Greatest weakness, it's possible that I'm a little too awesome.

regQuotes.name: Elon Musk
said: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
No matter how hard you work, someone else is working harder
The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur
If you need inspiration, don’t do it.
My family fears that the Russians will assassinate me.

regQuotes.name: Bruce Lee
said: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities
Obey the principles without being bound by them
The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be
